hooks.command: echo 'üìù Code modified - Running checks...'; cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && if [ -f "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/.claude/hooks/post-edit.sh" ]; then bash "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/.claude/hooks/post-edit.sh"; fi
echo 'üìã Pre-commit validation...'; cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && bun run lint --write 2>&1 | head -5 && FORCE_COLOR=1 bun test 2>&1 | grep -E '(pass|fail)' | tail -2
